tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Periodontal Flap Surgery,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Surgery,Bleeding Gums Treatment,Dental Checkup (General),
review:
I had bleeding gums and pain in my teeth. I went to Dr. Krupa. She is a Periodontist, a gum specialist. After examining she explained in detail of the cause of the issue. She suggested to have flap surgery. She also educated how to maintain the oral health. It has been 3 weeks now, and I could see a difference in my gums. No more bleeding and soreness. She also said I need to get fillings of my decayed teeth. I have an appointment next week with her for it. 
I hardly paid attention to my oral health but now realized how important it is. Prevention is always better than cure.
I highly recommend Dr. Krupa for the care and compassion she delivered.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My mother had taken treatment here, she had loose teeths it was very uncomfortable so doctor had done extraction the loose teeth and fixed artificial teeth.
